item.title: Department of Defense graduate funding programs information session to be held March 4th at noon
item.description: Date: Wednesday, March 4, 2026 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - The National Defense Science and Engineering Graduate Fellowship provides 3 years of tuition and salary for PhD students in STEM fields; there is no service requirement! The SMART Scholarship for Service program provides 1 to 5 years of tuition and salary for undergrads, master’s and PhD Students. Scholars will work in DoD labs during summers and post graduation. item.title: Student Experience Excellence Awards
item.description: The Student Experience Excellence Awards (formerly the Graduating Student Awards) recognize RPI students who have made exceptional contributions to our community through academic achievement, athletic accomplishment, leadership, service, and/or volunteerism. We invite students, staff, and faculty to nominate individuals who exemplify excellence and have made a meaningful impact on our campus.

item.description: Did you know that you can easily book online a small group tutoring session in many of RPI’s upper-level courses? Check out the fantastic small group tutoring sessions being offered at the Success Center!

item.title: DotCIO requests feedback on the student laptop program and for help selecting next year’s student laptops
item.description: The Mobile Computing Program is asking for feedback from the community to help select the most appropriate laptop models and specifications for this coming year. Additionally, we are seeking general feedback on the program. Please take a few minutes to complete this survey which is open through March 7, 2026.

item.title: RPI Recognized Staff for Service Milestones
item.description: RPI recognized staff at the February 20 Men’s Ice Hockey game for service milestones reached over the past five years, during which formal service recognition has been paused. The celebration brought together over 100 honorees, joined by family and friends, for a total of 450+ attendees— a memorable evening of recognition and appreciation of over 8,500 years of combined service to the Institute.

item.title: Rensselaer Faculty and Staff In Person Workshop - Beta Classroom - Teaching with Technology Preview
item.description: Date: Wednesday, March 4, 2026 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - Come see the Collaboratory space in the main library, and the exciting technologies available to you in the Beta Classroom. The beta classroom is a high technology testing space for interactive learning. The goal of the beta classroom is for faculty to pilot new or interactive technologies and pedagogical approaches that can be recommended for other classrooms on campus. item.title: Faculty & Staff Appreciation Lunch - February 26, 2026
item.description:
Join us for a Faculty and Staff Appreciation Lunch on Thursday, February 26, 2026, at The Commons and Russell Sage Dining Halls! As a thank you for all that you do, we’re offering a delicious all you care to eat lunch at a special price of just $6.00 plus tax. We look forward to seeing you there!
